front.title: GIST Extension for Hybrid On-path Off-path Signaling (HyPath)

abstract.t: In a multi-domain Internet that offers QoS guaranties forapplications, there is the need of signaling among the domainentities that are responsible for the management of QoS. Becausedifferent domains have different network protocols and topologies,the HyPath approach uses the NSIS protocol and interactions with thelocal routing protocols to have an off-path signaling in hybridenvironments.
